name: OVERHOSPITALIZED
description:
Fast paced co-op (or singleplayer) simulation game where you play as a hospital worker trying to keep alive as many patients as possible. Different diseases exist and you have to use the correct tool to cure them. Using the wrong tool could end in a disaster. The game ends when five of your patients die.

Be careful with the virus, it is really contagious so don’t forget to wash your hands!

Let’s see if you find the easter egg, Kobe would be proud.

CONTROLS:

NOTE: Universal gamepad controls are available for Player1 but we ran out of time so we couldn’t explain them in game. 

The game was done by two programmers who wish that you enjoy it as much as they did during its development.
